about_the_game:
This VR app allows you to ejaculate on beautiful women in the bukkake style.
The sperm has been recreated very realistically, making you feel as if you are actually ejaculating.
You can ejaculate on various parts of the model's body.
You can ejaculate as much as you want on her face, mouth, breasts, abdomen, butt, feet, pelvis, or wherever else you like.
You can also enjoy various costumes and poses.
By all means, please enjoy this VR app that is very erotic.

Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.


Explanation of the game:
You can cover a woman's face and body with sperm shot out of your penis.
The very realistic graphics for the sperm allow you to immerse yourself in this erotic situation.
Tap the cubes to change the outfit, the model, or the pose.

Controls:
You can move around freely and ejaculate from various angles.
The blue cube changes the pose.
The yellow cube changes the outfit and the model.
The red cube changes the item equipped.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Would you like to try ejaculating all over a woman's face? Would you like to have an endless supply of sperm? You can make this happen through VR. Now go ahead and unleash your desires.
